alert.note: Alert for Baker; Inland Nassau; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 7:19PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nassau, east central Baker, southwestern Duval and south central Charlton Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 719 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Macclenny, or 20 miles southwest of Callahan, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Macclenny, Glen St. Mary, Cecil Field, Bryceville, Baldwin and Whitehouse Air Field. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
